headline: GTA Online
subtitle: GTA$250,000 in GTA Online
content:
The worldâ€™s game is nearly upon us.

Log in to GTA Online any time between now and June 11th to register for a special celebratory GTA$ Cash Giveaway, then return after June 14th to receive GTA$250,000 in bonus cash. All GTA$ will arrive in your Maze Bank account no later than June 18th.
